testcase.name: Get all users
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users".......................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response should be a JSON array.....................................passed And the response array should have 10 items.................................passed

testcase.name: Get a specific user by ID
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users/1".....................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response should contain the following fields:.......................passed And the response field "id" should be 1.....................................passed And the response field "name" should be "Leanne Graham".....................passed

testcase.name: Create a new user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a POST request to "/users" with body:...........................passed Then the response status code should be 201.................................passed And the response field "name" should be "John Doe"..........................passed And the response field "username" should be "johndoe".......................passed

testcase.name: Update an existing user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a PUT request to "/users/1" with body:..........................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response field "name" should be "Updated Name"......................passed And the response field "username" should be "updateduser"...................passed

testcase.name: Partially update a user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a PATCH request to "/users/1" with body:........................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response field "email" should be "newemail@example.com".............passed

testcase.name: Delete a user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a DELETE request to "/users/1"..................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed

testcase.name: Get all posts for a user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users/1/posts"...............................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response should be a JSON array.....................................passed And all items should have field "userId" with value 1.......................passed

testcase.name: Verify response time
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users".......................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response time should be less than 2000 milliseconds.................passed

testcase.name: Verify response headers
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users/1".....................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response header "content-type" should contain "application/json"....passed

testcase.name: Get non-existent user
testcase.system-out: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"............passed When I send a GET request to "/users/9999"..................................passed Then the response status code should be 404.................................passed

testcase.name: Verify vineet website title
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "https://www.vineetkr.com"..............................passed When I wait for the page to load............................................passed Then the page title should contain "Technology Portfolio"...................passed

testcase.name: Verify vineet website link
